item.title: Dozens of scientists find errors in a new Energy Department climate report
item.description: More than 85 scientists say that a recent U.S. Department of Energy report is full of errors and misrepresents climate science.

item.title: Kraft Heinz is splitting up, separating hot dogs from ketchup
item.description: One of the world's largest food brands is splitting apart a decade after a messy megamerger staged by Warren Buffett.
